title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 803.13 - Consolidation of proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 803.13 - Consolidation of proceedings

State Regulations

The commissioner on his own motion or that of any party may
consolidate or contemporaneously consider two or more applications for
variances from cited standards which involve the same or closely related
issues. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
803.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
